name: Effortless Armor
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: Armor you wear no longer reduces your speed. You also reduce the armor's armor check penalty by 1 + 1 per five caster levels (maximum 5).
text_zh: 这个法术如同忍受环境 (Endure Elements) 一样工作，不过你可以以1小时为单位将持续时间分配给接触到的复数生物。
